snippet.title: Comments in Java
snippet.description:
New course coming soon! Learn Java Fast launches on July 1st, 2020. Stay informed and join the waitlist: https://course.alexlorenlee.com/courses/learn-java-fast
- In this video, I show you how to write comments in java and I share two tricks that helped me when using comments. In this tutorial, you will learn two ways to write comments and tricks to help you as a beginner.

You can write java comments like this:
// This is a comment 
/* This
  * is also
  * a comment
   */

The comment shortcut in java is ctl/cmd + /

This series, Java For Beginners, is made for absolute beginners who have no programming experience and want to learn how to code in Java. Java is a very widely used programming language used for everything from apps to AI. Learning how to program in Java can be intimidating, but I try to break it down to help all of you new/self-taught programmers out there! 

Check out the first video in this series Java For Beginners: https://youtu.be/az6SehZyY7U

Do you want to learn how to code from scratch? Check out my video on How to Code for Beginners in 2018: https://youtu.be/woJb2hAfkO0

Coding is nothing more than a to-do list for a computer. I hope to save you time and take the confusion out of coding, by teaching you helpful pieces of code you can use for your own programs.These tutorials are a way to try to help people save time and frustration when coding. I'VE BEEN THERE, it's 2018... let's make code easier, and beautiful.

I hope this video about java for beginners was helpful! If it helped you get started coding with Java, please like this video so I know to make more!

Have you ever seen java comments before? Did you learn it from class or on your own?

🌅 Source code: https://github.com/alexlorenlee/JavaTutorialCode/blob/master/Strings/CommentsTutorial.java -
